name: europe - A geographical quiz
description:
Hi!  So here is my little game :D

A geographical quiz-game, where you have to guess the location of several cities from europe.

At the start you can choose the language between german and english. 

In Training Mode u must underbid the max distance, which decreases from round to round.  At end you will see your score and ranking 

In Multiplayer Mode u played against another Human 4 Rounds. If it will work correctly:)

Have Fun!
